title: New Cars Worth Buying, Or Just Looking At -- AFTER/DRIVE
description:
If you were going to buy a new car today - money's no object, but don't feel obligated to go supercar - what cars would you look at? Let us know in the comments.

The Facebook thread that inspired this show:
https://www.facebook.com/DriveTV/posts/475974995852114

The Slashdrive.tv thread:
http://slashdrive.tv/post/64861203447/we-talk-a-lot-about-sports-cars-from-the-past-but

More /DRIVE on:
http://www.slashdrive.tv
http://www.twitter.com/drive
